overview:
Technologist, entrepreneur and security guy.

Casey worked for others in the information security industry (engineering, consulting, sales, marketing) for 9 years before going rogue 3 years ago to start the Tall Poppy Group, a tech consultancy and start-up skunkworks.

The Tall Poppy Group has since spawned White Label Security, a rebranded information security services provider, and Bugcrowd, who run managed bug bounties for business.

Casey is a compulsive problem solver and cannot decide if he is a techy trapped in the body of a salesman or vice versa.
